1183960.name: Fantasy Grounds - Battle Runes 1 Spell Effect Tokens (Token Pack)
1183960.description:
Battle Runes 1 Spell Effect Tokens

Battle Runes are for those of us who enjoy adding functional visual flair to their games.
Contents:
20 Tokens in both small and large format (total of 40).
Place them under characters or monsters to represent conditions, or to visually show environmental effects, or locations of objects and traps.
For example; 'That monster is on fire!' - Add a Fire Battle Rune under it for as long as the fire effect lasts and if the fire spreads, add another token.
The tokens are aimed to be flexible and cover a multitude of spells and effects.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
